Academic Experience

2019 - Present Research Assistant @ Georgia Southern University
Research Assistant under Dr. Fernando Ríos. Currently performing comparative study on different machine learning algorithms and feature extraction methods at executing classification tasks for EEG (electroencephalogram) BCI (brain-computer interface) applications.
2017 - 2018 Research Assistant @ Georgia Southern University
Research assistant under Dr. Sungkyun Lim. Developed MATLAB-based application to implement parallel computation techniques to accelerate planar antenna simulations using antenna simulation software such as FEKO, CST and IE3D. Assisted in project funded by ARRIS, Inc. that studied array antenna design and propagation modeling to achieve the best 60GHz coverage for home Wi-Fi systems
2018 – 2019 Teaching Assistant @ Georgia Southern University
Laboratory teaching assistant for Electric Circuit Analysis class. Provided assistance and instruction to students conducting laboratory experiments including building resistor networks, measuring current and voltage, Op-Amp circuits and full-wave rectifiers.
2019 Academic Success Tutor @ Georgia Southern University
Mathematics tutor for Georgia Southern University’s Academic Success Center during the summer term.
2017 - 2019 Resident Advisor @ Georgia Southern University
Created and coordinated programs that promote campus resources and community building with hall of 22 freshmen. Utilized problem-solving skills and mediated discussion during ambiguous and/or unexpected situations.

Performance and Audio Experience

2019-Present Recording Technician @ Georgia Southern University
Responsible for recording and mixing recitals under the Department of Music.
2016-2018 Sound and Audio Technician @ Statesboro SDA Church
In charge of audio recording, mixing/mastering, lighting and audiovisuals. Responsible for maintenance and repair of audio equipment and other electronic devices.
2017 - Present Play of the Game (Funk Collective) @ Statesboro, GA
Cofounder, primary songwriter and guitarist for funk collective Play of the Game. Composed, produced, recorded, mixed, and published single on all major streaming services.
2017 - Present Guitarist @ GS Jazz Ensemble
Rhythm guitarist and featured soloist for the GSU Jazz Ensemble.

About

A diligent, autodidactic, research-oriented student with three years of experience in research in different fields of Electrical Engineering with an emphasis on signal processing and machine learning for EEG and audio applications.

Education

2016 - 2020 Georgia Southern University
Thesis: “EEG Brain-Computer Interface for Live Music Performance”
Advisor: Fernando Rios Gutierrez, Associate Professor, Georgia Southern University
GPA: 4.0
